text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Remember four months ago when Trump told us that COVID-19 would simply evaporate and disappear by April?
Remember last month when Trump touted hydroxychloroquine as a miracle cure?
Remember two weeks ago when Trump suggested that we inject ourselves with disinfectant?
I remember.
